 1997-07031997-04-270,  ,  PTB,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the RETIREMENT COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS, NO. 1 that will allow employees who leave the federal public service before entitlement to a pension to transfer the lump sum value of their pension to another pension plan or other retirement savings vehicle, or to purchase an annuity.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1997-0252 Publication Date: 1997-05-14
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the RETIREMENT COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS,
NO. 1 that will allow employees who leave the federal public service before
entitlement to a pension to transfer the lump sum value of their pension to
another pension plan or other retirement savings vehicle, or to purchase an
annuity.
